name: School Bus Drive Simulator 3D
description:
School Bus Drive Simulator2016 is an exciting game where you can learn the road rules and prove that you can drive a school bus in a real life and carry kids to school.
School kids environment with town and city theme.

Three different mode to play the game.

Multiple levels and task to be completed in given time frame.

would appreciate your valuable feedback so we can improve quality of our work.

Download free !!!
